q1.question: What AI does Trend Copilot use?
q1.answer: Trend Copilot is powered by GPT-4 and GPT-4o, with custom fine-tuning, prompt optimization and user preferences layered on top. It’s not just text generation — it’s strategic content built for you.

q2.question: Is my data protected?
q2.answer: Yes. Your data is never sold or used to train AI. We fully comply with GDPR regulations.

q3.question: Which social media platforms are supported?
q3.answer: Trend Copilot currently supports LinkedIn. Instagram and X (Twitter) integrations are in progress.

q4.question: When will I get access?
q4.answer: Private access will open starting June 2025. Join the waitlist to be notified.

q5.question: How much does it cost?
q5.answer: Two plans will be available at launch: Starter (€29/month) and Pro (€59/month). A multi-user or team plan may be offered based on demand.

q6.question: Will there be customer support?
q6.answer: Yes, you’ll get support via email and from inside your dashboard. A help center will also be available.

q7.question: Is the tool multilingual?
q7.answer: Yes. Trend Copilot is available in French and English, and content generation is optimized for both languages.
